Soundcity TV bụ ụlọ ọrụ Televishọn ndụ na egwu Naijiria nke na-eme awa iri abụọ na anọ nke dị na Lagos site na Consolidated Media Associates Limited
Soundcity TV na-akọwa onwe ya dị ka "ụlọ ọrụ TV nke egwu obodo Afrịka".
Soundcity TV bụ ụlọ ọrụ TV na-ewu ewu ma na-egosi vidiyo egwu, ihe ngosi, akụkọ na ajụjụ ọnụ na ihe omume ndị a ma ama na mgbakwunye na ịhazi, ịkwado na igosi egwu mpaghara na nke mba ụwa
Vidio egwu kachasị ọhụrụ sitere na United States, England, na ụwa ndị ọzọ na-agafe ụdị niile na-egosi na Channel
Ụdị ụmụnne nwanyị gụnyere Soundcity Music Video Awards, Soundcity Urban Blast Festival, Buddie, Soundcity Radio Network, na Soundcity Digital

SoundcityTV malitere dị ka ihe ngosi TV nke nkeji iri atọ tupu a malite ya na DStv na 2009 na egwu egwu ndị Naijiria a ma ama dị ka 2face Idibia na Dībanj na-enweta ọtụtụ ikuku ruo n'ebe ọwụwa anyanwụ dị ka Kenya na Congo, na ndịda dị ka Zimbabwe na South Africa nke n'aka nke ya nwere egwu ha dị ka Fally Ipupa na Freshly Ground na-ewu ewu na Naijiria
Soundcity na-ekere òkè dị ike na mgbanwe ọdịbendị a.
Soundcity dị na mba ịrị ịse na ise nke Afrịka na akara ụkwụ DStv, GOtv

Soundcity malitere na Southern Africa mgbe ihe karịrị afọ iri gachara na MultiChoice DStv na 1 Disemba 2016 na akara ngosi, mmetụta na ihe ngosi ọhụrụ dị ka 'Top 10 Ghana', 'Top 10 South Africa', 'Top10 Kenya' na 'Top 10 USA' na ndepụta egwu ọhụrụ dị ka "Too Much Sauce', 'Video Unlimited' na 'Addiction'.
Soundcity Music Video Awards mere emume vidiyo egwu kachasị mma site n'aka ndị na-agụ egwu n'Africa n'ụdị dị iche iche nke onye na-agụ egwu na mba ụwa

SMVA gosipụtara onye America na-eti egwu hip hop aha ya bu Nas, otu egwu South Africa Freshlyground, Tic Tac si Ghana, Wyre si Kenya, otu egwu hip hop nke South Africa Jozi, Nigeria Seun Kuti na onye America na onye na-eti miziki hip hop Mims
Mbipụta ikpeazụ e mere na 2010.
All Sound city Awards na-eweta ha na Morena Labane maka inweta ndekọ nke ibudata egwu UK n'okpuru ala na Trap Hip Hop 2021 Eprel 7

A mụrụ ihe ngosi egwu Blast dị ka Soundcity MTN Campus Blast na 2007 ebe a na-ewere ndị na-ese ihe na Naijiria gụnyere 2face, 9ice na P Square gburugburu ụlọ akwụkwọ iji mee ihe ngosi egwu nye ọtụtụ puku ụmụ akwụkwọ

N'afọ 2014, mgbawa nke ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ zuru ike ghọrọ Soundcity Urban Blast Festival, ihe nkiri telivishọn na-eme ihe nkiri site na ihe karịrị iri atọ (30) Naijiria, South Africa na ndị ọzọ na-eme egwuregwu n'Afrịka.
N'afọ 2016, Soundcity Radio Network malitere n'obodo Lagos, Abuja, Kano, Port Harcourt, Enugu na Calabar na-agụ na ọdịyo na vidiyo na ebe nrụọrụ weebụ gọọmentị.
Soundcity TV mara ọkwa emume ihe nrite ọhụrụ n'izu mbụ nke Nọvemba na Soundcity Radio Network na Soundcity TV, nke a na-akpọ Soundcity MVP Awards Festival
Ememe izizi ahụ weere ọnọdụ na Expo Centre, Eko Hotel na Suites Lagos, Nigeria na 29 Disemba 2016

Ndị na-agụ egwu a họpụtara gụnyere Wizkid onye nwere nhọpụta asatọ gụnyere onye na-agụ egwu Africa nke afọ, Davido, Emtee nke South Africa, Nasty C, Mafikizolo na Mz Vee nke Ghana, Sarkodie na Diamond Platnumz nke Tanzania na Vanessa Mdee
A ga-agbasa ihe omume ahụ na ndụ gafee Africa site na cable TV, Soundcity Mobile App, Facebook na YouTube.
